issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Failure to reset instance-types using euca-modify-instance-type tool

comments.body: [~gholms], can you confirm this is a tool issue? If not, can you convert to a EUCA case? Thanks...

The line needs to change to:

{code}
              PredefinedTypes defaultVmType = PredefinedTypes.valueOf( vmTypeName.toUpperCase( ).replace( ".", "" ) );
{code}

I made the change and tested it and it solve the problem. 

{noformat}
